#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
int main() 
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n;
		cin>>n;
		ll l[n];
		for(ll q=0;q<n;q++)
		cin>>l[q];
		ll sum=0;
		for(ll q=1;q<n;q++)
		{
			if(l[q]>l[q-1]) sum++;
			//sum+=(l[q]-l[q-1]);
			
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
